name: Construction Forklift Crane Driver 3D Simulator
description:
Get ready to drive and operate container and car lifting crane in extreme fork lifting challenging situations for airport, city and parking zone in Construction Forklift Crane Driver 3D Simulator game.


Extreme addictive and fun game play as professional operator drive forklift crane. Enjoy driving cranes in city various locations help airport ground staff to load container, freight boxes in the airplane flight. As professional operate cranes move cargo container from one location. Car wrong parked in parking zone it’s your duty to lift the car and park it at free space area. Also have to load cars on transporter truck, don’t damage new sports cars.



Download Construction Forklift Crane Driver 3D Simulator game in your mobile and tablet for real driver experience.
